posts.post_content:
I am looking for these cards to complete a back run of T206 Sam Crawford cards.  there are basically 2 categories.  

Category 1 - These are targets within my budget

Throwing – Old Mill
Throwing – Sovereign 350
Batting – Sweet Caporal 350-460/420P

Category 2 - I would have to hit the lottery to likely buy these

American Beauty 460
Drum
Lenox
Uzit


If anyone has anything from Category 1 for sale, would love for you to send me a PM and include front and back scans and a price.

If you have anything from Category 2 in your collection....well...I would just love if you could share a scan!

Happy Collecting

Dave
